transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Hello. Namaskar sir, Lakshman baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ha boliye.
Executive: Sir main jo 23rd se baat ho rahi hai.
Customer: Ha ho rahi hai.
Executive: To sir aapne ticket raise kiya tha. Main jaan sakta hu kya customer care pe kya dikkat aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Sir hamare to ye liya hua hai, contract liya hua hai, usme koi na lead aa rahi hai RCC pipe ki na manual cover ki kuch nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Accha koi leads vgera?
Customer: Nahi. Hello?
Executive: Accha boliye. Leads vgera nahi aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Nahi.
Customer: Sab bahar se aa raha hai, Delhi, Gujarat, Ahmedabad ye sab aa raha hai.
Executive: Aapko kaha ki chahiye sir? Aapko matlab aap is is matlab usme deal nahi karte ho Delhi, Ahmedabad, Gujarat?
Customer: Nahi nahi sir hamara jo product hai wo export nahi ho sakta na. Utna bhari bhari saman export nahi hota hai.
Executive: Accha to aapko matlab aapko waha ki leads nahi chahiye?
Customer: Nahi hamara Bengal mein pura West Bengal.
Executive: Accha aapko West Bengal ka hi chahiye. Baki?
Customer: Ha West Bengal West Bengal nearest ho gaya aapka Bihar.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Okay. Odisha.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Aaiye sir aap se.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Sir aapko na video video call pe main connect karta hu aur sir aapko wahi ka hi leads milega. Main baki ka aapka sir not preferred mein dal dunga baki states. To sir are you ready to connect on video call?
Customer: Ha ha ha.
Executive: Okay sir. I am connecting you on on the video call. So I am scheduling your video call sir.
Executive: Wait a minute sir.
Executive: Sir aapke paas sir mail gaya hoga.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Ha boliye.
Executive: Sir aapke paas mail pe mail pe aaya hoga sir video call ke liye.
Customer: Accha theek hai main karta hu.
Executive: Sir theek hai kariye aap.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Ye to actually mera phone mein main to laptop leke nikla nahi hu sir.
Executive: Nahi nahi koi baat nahi sir. Actually kya hai ki aap aapki problem kya hai ki aapko matlab bahar se matlab wo dikhai de raha hai ki jo leads vgera hai. Yahi hai na aapki problem?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: To aapko aapko matlab apne West Bengal ka hi matlab leads vgera chahiye. To main main problem ye hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To kya hai kya hai ki sir agar aapko bahar se jaha se bhi leads vgera dikhai de raha hai na aap aap un aap unhe not relevant mark kar sakte hain. Jaise ki aaj aapko lead aaya. Maan ke chalo maan ke chalo aaj aapko Odisha se aaya. Theek hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To aap waha pe not relevant mark kar dijiye ki mujhe Odisha se lead nahi chahiye. Fir aapko Odisha se sir koi lead koi bhi leads aapko matlab dikhai nahi degi.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Aaya sir samajh mein?
Customer: Ha samajh mein aaya.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Waha not relevant sir sir kyuki kyuki sir hame aapke concern pe sir ye ticket close karna hota hai. To aapne jo aapne jo ticket raise kiya hai. To to sir main puch raha tha abhi tak aapka kuch IndiaMART se conversion vgera hua?
Customer: Nahi abhi tak to kuch nahi hua hai sir.
Executive: Kuch nahi hua hai sir? Ek minute ek minute ek minute sir.
Executive: Lekin aapko sir inquiries and calls to sir kafi aayi hai.
Customer: Ha to aayi hai sab dekhiye sab bahar ki hai.
Executive: Accha nahi bahar ki hai. Aapko sari sari sari bahar ki hai sir. Sir dekho.
Customer: Aap ek page suno.
Executive: Ha ha dekh dekh raha hu main sir wahi dekh raha hu. Sari bahar ki hai. Chal chalo theek hai sir main hai na aap aap sir video call pe connect huiye sir. And nahi to aap na sir waha pe jaake not relevant mark kar sakte hain apne usko. Jaha se bhi agar aapko galat leads aa rahi hai na.
Customer: Ha. To jaise maan ke chalo ek page mein ek page mein 20 hota hai 20 to main not relevant markte rahu to kitna time lag jayega sir. Hai na?
Executive: Nahi sir ya ha to fir aap na aap wo state bhi hata sakte ho jaha se aapko jyada aa rahi hai na jaise aap bol rahe hain ki mujhe waha se lead hi nahi chahiye to aap pura ka pura state hata sakte ho apne usme jaake seller panel mein jaake.
Customer: Accha theek hai main dekhta hu rukiye.
Executive: Ha sir sir mujhe aapka ticket close karna hai aap video call pe connect ho jaana main aapka wo main actually train mein hu na to line line ka disturb ho raha hai thoda. Ha main samajh gaya. Main main metro metro ke andar hu to waha par. Nahi nahi main main samajh gaya lekin sir ticket bhi close aaj hi karna hai sir. Hmm. Main aap main aapki problem solve karwa dunga lekin mujhe sir jo aapka ticket hai na wo close karna padega kyuki ye problem itni itni badi nahi hai agar aap satisfy hai to sir main aapki jo hai solve kar matlab aapka ticket close kar du?
Customer: Nahi nahi ticket main problem solve nahi hoga to ticket kaise close kar denge aap. Nahi sir aap aap jab aap jab available ho jayenge sir main tab aapki wo problem solve kar dunga aap mujhe contact kar lena bas. Bas aapko kya karna hai contact karna hai. Main accha. Main aapko message dal dunga sir ki aap are are you matlab ready to connect with me to. Accha aap message daliye to main us number pe ye kar dunga. Kya sir? To abhi ke liye ye abhi ke liye close kijiye to. Theek hai. Theek hai sir abhi ke liye abhi ke liye main close kar deta hu sir aur sir aap aap aap jab aap aap jab matlab aap aap free ho mujhe connect kar lena. Theek hai sir. Hello? Theek hai sir aap jab free ho jaoge sir?
Customer: Main to abhi raste mein hu abhi ghar lotte 8 baj jayega raat baje to hoga nahi to subah hi kar paunga.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Mail pe ek message jayega sir us pe yes kar dena kyuki wo ticket aaj hi close karni hai. Wo wo wo mere liye hoga ki maine aapse baat ki hai kyuki ye aapka concern tha na isliye. Theek hai theek hai. Theek hai sir. Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant buyleads.

- Receiving buyleads from outside West Bengal.



Resolution:

- Executive offered video call to resolve issue.

- Suggested marking irrelevant leads as 'not relevant'.

- Suggested removing entire states from seller panel.

- Agreed to close the ticket for now.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to connect when free.

- Customer to confirm via email.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, not relevant, ticket, video call
